We're building a rocket ship.  My role is to grow the development practice in Austin while guaranteeing quality in delivery across numerous technologies.  I work with a talented staff of IX, UX, and Visual Designers as well my my development team to bring visionary applications to life with a strong focus on user research and testability via MV* patterns.  I bill as an architect or CTO for hire as well as develop all sizes of applications, train, hire, sell, and mature the practice offering and processes.

Developed unified authentication attribute for MVC, RIA, and REST.  Built Windows 8 Sitefinity Dashboard application, developed HTML5 Webcam application for Google I/O, migrated Sitefinity sites, developed a way for windows desktop apps to have live tiles in Windows 8.
.NET architect and engineer for one of the world's best consulting firms, engaged with Dell to help rebuild the Dell.com shopping experience.

Architected and built a secure and scalable system to deliver live streaming video Roku devices, the web, iOS and Android devices using HTML5 and Flash.  Built a customer security scheme to prevent users form sharing logins to watch video streams simulatanteously and to time out unused video streams to prevent unnecessary bandwidth utilization.  Employ a COTS video advertising package to further monetize streams on certain platforms.

recommendations: Technology Executive, Transformational Agile Leader & Coach; Helping companies deliver value and create raving fans

From the time I joined Schwab and was introduced to Paul, I could immediately see that he was an intelligent and dedicated developer, with passion for his work and infectious positive attitude. Over the years I managed Paul, first as a developer, then as a tech lead, and finally as a manager, he consistently surprised me with how fast he learned new technology and how well he adapted to changes in work environment and business direction. But most of all, Paul was always the consummate team player and great communicator, with a keen ability to connect with his employees, his peers and his superiors. I would recommend Paul unequivocally and would love to work with him again.

Sirisha jumped into an extremely fast paced development project and supported delivery of 5 applications to production in a 7 month timeframe. We developed an iOS application, 3 Angular apps, an Electron app, and a web service tier concurrently and her depth of understanding of the applications, her attention to detail, and her ability to remain organized were critical to the project's success. I hope we find the opportunity to work together again, people this good are hard to come by.

summary: I am a software architect and leader.  I measure success by delivering exactly what the user needs wrapped in a compelling UX on time and on budget. Software that exceeds the expectations of the business while being scalable, extensible, maintainable, traceable, secure, compliant and performant are hallmarks of winning software projects - and we deliver these continuously for dozens of clients a year.I have been a professional graphic designer and 3d animator, built high performance software solutions for securities trading, developed APIs, built killer software teams from scratch, and architected many solutions across a plethora of platforms and form factors.My goal is to continually improve as a leader, technical evangelist and strategist as I deliver products that exceed expectations while delivering on time and on budget and to work with talented and passionate people who share those values and goals.C#, C++, Java, Golang, Roku, JavaScript, and objective C are the languages of communication, aside from English. I love 12factor solutions deployed to containers and embrace automation.
